page.title: 02PUDDLETOWN CONTINUED
page.content: { { }Situated on the junction of the A35 and A354 Puddletown has a considerable amount of traffic passing through it,especially in the summer holiday season.It is planned that it shall have a by-pass built in the near future. The area has to some extent become a dormitory area for people working in the nearby towns, such as Dorchester and Poole.This has meant that a considerable number of young families have recently moved in to the area. Puddletown is a thriving community with numerous clubs and associations for young and old alike.A library,a village hall, a youth centre and two schools (a 5-9 first school and a 9-13 middle school) help maintain this community spirit and activity.
